TopicTitle: Is it possible to give a liquid engine internal fuel?

Articles.Content: You know how Solid Rocket Boosters use Internal fuel in this game? Can you give internal fuel to a liquid engine so you don\'t need a tank above it by editing the config? If so, how?

that literally makes no sense, sorry..

that\'s like saying i need to put gas in my tires (and not the air kind)

you can, on the other hand, attach a fuel pipe to it

that literally makes no sense, sorry..

that\'s like saying i need to put gas in my tires (and not the air kind)

you can, on the other hand, attach a fuel pipe to it

You know the SRB\'s have an internal fuel. I want to know if it\'s possible for to mod the engine so it handles as if it is attached to a fuel tank...

You know the SRB\'s have an internal fuel. I want to know if it\'s possible for to mod the engine so it handles as if it is attached to a fuel tank...

oh, well in that case i cant help you

Protip:

if your talking about modding, mention modding

Possible, probably. Will it be done? Unlikely. Why? Simple; there\'re SRBs for that xD

And yeah, you can\'t throttle SRBs, but there\'s planned to be a greater variety of them in future, so it won\'t be such an issue. Also, with the resources and modules upgrades, I seem to recall Nova saying a part would have multiple types -- such as a command pod and SAS module, for example.... so this would be possible in the next few major updates anyhow. Probably.
